text: Bargasa () was an inland town in the north of ancient Caria, inhabited during Hellenistic and Roman times. Its site is located near Haydere/Kavaklı in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Caria Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:History of Aydın Province
title: Bargasa (northern Caria)
